item.title: Tiered Subnet Calculator in Terraform
item.description: I’ve been thinking about adding support for building tiered subnets of any valid size for the next iteration of the Dynamic VPC Module. It occurred to me that auto subnet generation inside the module actually makes the subnetting less dynamic. Furthermore, auto subnet calculation should be in assistance to the process of allocating subnets and should not be fed directly as input to the VPC module. This is due to the fact that order matters only for the subnetting calculation.
